alert.note: Alert for Custer; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:08AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perkins, southeastern Keith, central Lincoln and southwestern Custer Counties through 315 AM CDT/215 AM MDT/... At 208 AM CDT/108 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area to near Maxwell. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Sutherland, Hershey, Paxton, Brady, Maxwell, Sarben, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Keith, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Etna, Coker, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, O`Fallons, Birdwood and Vroman. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 145 and 207. Highway 83 between mile markers 69 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.
